joinVC: please join a voice channel before using this.
wrongVC: you must be in the same voice channel as me to use this.
notInVC: I must be in a voice channel and playing music for this to be usable.
noQueue: I couldn't find a queue for this server, so I'm assuming nothing is playing, and music is inactive.

queueEnd.title: Queue Empty
queueEnd.description: I've stopped playback and left the voice channel due to the queue being empty.
